item.name: Get ONU types list

header.description: (Required) The API token

request.description:
Gets a list of all ONU types as defined in SmartOLT ONU Types section.
Each ONU type consists of:
  • unique ID
  • name
  • PON type (it can be "gpon" or "epon")
  • capability (it can be "Bridging" or "Bridging/Routing")
  • number of ethernet ports
  • number of WiFi ports
  • number of VoIP ports
  • CATV
  • if it allows custom ONU profiles (1 - it allows, 0 - it doesn't allow)

item.name: Get ONU type image

header.description: (Required) The API token

request.description:
Gets the ONU type image for a specified ONU type unique ID. The response consists of:

  • Onu type png image

It returns a 400 error code when:

  • no ONU type unique ID was provided

  • no ONU type was found for the provided unique ID

You can feed the response directly to an img tag in the src attribute with a Content-type header of "image/png". Example:


PHP

header("Content-type: image/png");
echo $response_image;


HTML

img src="link_to_your_method_where_you_call_the_api"

  • if ONU is disabled (1 - is disabled, 0 - is enabled)
  • A list of possible actions for this ONU: view, resync_config, authorize, move_here
It returns a 400 error code when:
  • no OLT ID was provided
  • no OLT was found for the provided OLT ID

item.name: Get all ONUs statuses

header.description: (Required) The API token

query.description: (Int) The ID of the OLT for which to get the ONUs statuses. Leave empty if you want statuses from all OLTs
(Int) OLT board where the ONUs are placed. Leave it empty if you want statuses from all boards on the provided OLT ID
(Int) OLT PON port where ONUs are placed. Leave it empty if you want statuses from all PON ports on the provided board

(String) The zone where the ONUs are located. The Zone can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscore and the dash (-) character. Leave it empty if you want ONUs statuses from all the zones

request.description:
Gets all the ONUs statuses for a specified OLT ID, board, PON port or zone. If no OLT ID, board, PON port or zone is specified, then all the ONUs statuses on all OLTs will be returned.
ONU statuses returned can be:
  • Online
  • Power fail
  • LOS
  • Offline
It returns a 400 error code when:
  • no OLT was found for the provided OLT ID
  • no OLT ID was provided with board or PON port
  • no OLT ID or no board was provided with PON port
  • no Zone was found for the provided zone name

  • no Zone was found for the provided zone name

item.name: Get all ONUs details

header.description: (Required) The API token

query.description: (Int) The ID of the OLT for which to get the ONUs details. Leave empty if you want ONUs details from all OLTs
(Int) OLT board where the ONUs are placed. Leave it empty if you want ONUs details from all boards on the provided OLT ID
(Int) OLT PON port where ONUs are placed. Leave it empty if you want ONUs details from all PON ports on the provided board

(String) The zone where the ONUs are located. The Zone can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscore and the dash (-) character. Leave it empty if you want ONUs details from all the zones
(String) ODB splitter. The ODB (Splitter) can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscore and the dash (-) character

request.description:
Gets all the ONUs details for a specified OLT ID, board, PON port or zone. If no OLT ID, board, PON port or zone is specified, then all the ONUs details on all OLTs will be returned. The "Get all ONUs details" method is equivalent to an export of the entire database of ONU details and therefore it is not recommended to be used repeatedly, as the contained information does not change so often. Maximum recommended calls for "Get all ONUs details": 3 per hour (calls are blocked after the limit is reached). The response consists of:

  • ONU name

  • ONU SN

  • ONU board, port, onu etc

It returns a 400 error code when:

  • no OLT was found for the provided OLT ID

  • no OLT ID was provided with board or PON port

  • no OLT ID or no board was provided with PON port

  • no Zone was found for the provided zone name

  • no ODB (Splitter) was found for the provided ODB name

item.name: Get ONU full status info by ONU unique external ID

header.description: (Required) The API token

request.description:
Gets the ONU full status info for a specified ONU unique external ID. It should be used to solve problems of individual ONU cases and NOT to extract information for ALL ONUs. ONU full status info contains info about:

  • Current status

  • Status history

  • Optical Tx, Rx signals

  • Ethernet interfaces

  • WAN status

  • MAC table

  • Other ONU info

It returns a 400 error code when:

  • no ONU external ID was provided

  • no ONU was found for the provided ONU external ID

  • OLT wasn't able to process the command

  • ONU is saved for later authorization and doesn't have status info yet

The graph_type can be:
  • hourly
  • daily
  • weekly
  • monthly
  • yearly
The response consists of:
  • Graph png image
It returns a 400 error code when:
  • no ONU external ID was provided
  • no ONU was found for the provided ONU external ID
  • ONU doesn't have signal graph yet
You can feed the response directly to an img tag in the src attribute with a Content-type header of "image/png". Example:

PHP header("Content-type: image/png"); echo $response_graph;

(Required, String) ONU PON type. Allowed values: gpon, epon
(Int) OLT board where the ONU is placed. Leave it empty if you don't know yet
(Int) OLT PON port where ONU is placed. Leave it empty if you don't know yet
(Required, String) ONU SN
(Required, String) ONU type

(String) Custom profile - THIS IS NOT THE SPEED PROFILE (the default speed profiles will be used, if you wish to change them you will need to make a separate API call after authorization). The custom profile name should not contain whitespaces
(Required, String) ONU mode. Allowed values: Routing, Bridging
(Int) ONU CVLAN-ID
(Int) ONU SVLAN-ID
(String) Tag-transform mode. Allowed values: default, translate, translate-and-add
(Int) Use "other-all" TLS VLAN. Allowed values: 0, 1
(Required, Int) ONU VLAN-ID
(Required, String) The zone where the ONU is located. The Zone can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscore and the dash (-) character
(String) ODB splitter. The ODB (Splitter) can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces, underscore and the dash (-) character
(Required, String) Name. The Name can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces and the following characters: @#$&()-`.+,/_
(String) Address or comment. The Address or Comment can contain only alphanumeric characters, spaces and the following characters: @#$&()-`.+,/_
(String) ONU unique external ID. The ONU external ID can contain only alphanumeric characters
(String) Upload speed profile name
(String) Download speed profile name

request.description:
Authorize ONU

Authorizes an ONU on the provided OLT. If board or port are left empty then the ONU is saved for later authorization. The ONU type name must be one defined in SmartOLT ONU Types section.
The request returns succesfully if the ONU was authorized successfully.
It returns a 400 error code when:
  • no OLT ID was provided
  • no OLT was found for the provided OLT ID
  • no ONU PON type or a wrong ONU PON type was provided
  • no ONU SN/MAC was provided
  • the SN/MAC is in the wrong format
  • no VLAN-ID was provided
  • no ONU type was provided
  • no ONU type was found for the provided ONU type name
  • no Zone was provided
  • the Zone is in the wrong format
  • the ODB (Splitter) is in the wrong format
  • no Name was provided
  • the Name is in the wrong format
  • the Address or Comment is in the wrong format
  • no ONU mode or a wrong ONU mode was provided
  • the Custom profile is in the wrong format
  • the ONU external ID is in the wrong format
  • the ONU external ID is already existing
  • OLT was unable to process the command

item.name: Set ONU Mgmt IP mode to Static IP by ONU unique external ID

header.description: (Required) The API token

formdata.description: (Required, Int) ONU Mgmt VLAN-ID
(Int) ONU Mgmt CVLAN-ID
(Int) ONU Mgmt SVLAN-ID
(String) Tag-transform mode. Allowed values: default, translate, translate-and-add

(String) IPv4 address or IP subnet (IP pool). The IPv4 address must be a valid IP address or a valid IP subnet (IP pool). The system will autoassign an available IP address from the existing IP pools, if this field is not specified.
(String) Subnet mask. The Subnet mask must be a valid IP address
(String) Gateway. The Gateway must be a valid IP address
(String) DNS1. The DNS1 must be a valid IP address
(String) DNS2. The DNS2 must be a valid IP address

request.description:
Set ONU Mgmt IP mode to Static IP for a specified ONU unique external ID

The request returns succesfully if the ONU Mgmt IP mode was updated successfully. Possible combinations for setting Mgmt IP mode to Static IP through API: - VLAN only (the system will autoassign an available IP address from the existing IP pools) - VLAN + IP subnet (ex: 10.100.0.0/24) - VLAN + IP address + subnet mask + gateway + dns1 + dns2 It returns a 400 error code when:

  • no ONU external ID was provided

  • no ONU was found for the provided ONU external ID

  • no VLAN-ID, IPv4 address, subnet mask, gateway, DNS1 was provided

  • wrong VLAN-ID, IPv4 address, subnet mask, gateway, DNS1, DNS2 was provided

  • OLT was unable to process the command

At least one speed profile name must be provided. The profile names must be the ones defined in SmartOLT Speed Profiles section.
